statements: UPDATE parking_regulations SET permit_required = TRUE, regulation_type = 'Residential' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE parking_regulations SET street_name = 'Main Street', permit_required = FALSE WHERE id = 2
UPDATE parking_regulations SET permit_required=TRUE, regulation_type='Paid' WHERE street_name='Main Street'
UPDATE parking_regulations SET regulation_type='Free', permit_required=FALSE WHERE id=3
UPDATE Parking_Regulations SET fine_amount = 50.00, regulation = 'No Parking' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Parking_Permits SET end_date = '2023-12-31', vehicle_number = 'ABC1234' WHERE permit_id = 5;
UPDATE Parking_Regulations SET regulation = 'No Parking on Odd Days', fine_amount = 50.00 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Parking_Permits SET vehicle_number = 'XYZ123', end_date = '2022-12-31', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE permit_id = 100
UPDATE CityOfficials SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE official_id=1;
UPDATE ParkingPermits SET permit_type='Residential' WHERE permit_id=2;
UPDATE CityOfficials SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE official_id = 1;
UPDATE ParkingPermits SET permit_type = 'Resident Permit', validity_period = 365 WHERE permit_id = 101;
UPDATE parking_permits SET permit_cost = 50.00 WHERE permit_id = 1;
UPDATE parking_locations SET location_capacity = 100 WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE parking_locations SET location_capacity = 200, location_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE parking_permits SET permit_duration = 30, permit_cost = 50.00 WHERE permit_id = 2;
UPDATE Parking_Regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated parking rules' WHERE regulation_id = 1;
UPDATE Parking_Permits SET permit_status = 'Active' WHERE permit_id = 5;
UPDATE Parking_Locations SET city='New York', state='NY', location_address='123 Main Street' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE City_Officials SET official_role='Senior Official', department='Transportation', city='New York' WHERE official_id = 3;
